All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CustomerController
    Description: Responsible for collection of Customer Pojo's in XHTML (list) Delegates all C-R-U-D behaviour to DAO.
    CustomerDao
    Description: API for the database C-R-U-D operations.
    CustomerDaoImpl
    Description: Implements the C-R-U-D API for the database.
    CustomerPojo
    Description: model for the Customer object.
    FacesConfigAndServletContextListener
    Programatically replace web.xml setup with this ServletContextListener NB: some web.xml elements cannot be programatically replaced, for example <welcome-file-list>
